sys_documentation.help: When editing a transaction, the Approving Official selected in this lookup will overwrite the contents of the Approving Official field. When adding a new transaction, the selected approving officiall will specify the Approving Official, as well as this lookup field.
sys_documentation.hint: When editing a transaction, the Approving Official selected in this lookup will overwrite the contents of the Approving Official field. When adding a new transaction, the selected approving officiall will specify the Approving Official, as well as this lookup field.
sys_documentation.label: Approving Official Lookup
sys_documentation.name: x_561190_micro_p_0_transactions
